passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(23) > div > section > div:nth-child(1) > h1
html > body > div:nth-child(24) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > h6:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(24) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > h6:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(24) > div > div > div:nth-child(3) > h6:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(24) > div > div > div:nth-child(4) > h6:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(59) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(3) > iframe

any.message: Heading order valid
